channel.title: Future-of-Web-Apps on Argolon Solutions
channel.description: Recent content in Future-of-Web-Apps on Argolon Solutions

item.title: FoWA MP3s and Presentations now available
item.description: The good people of Carson Systems have made the recordings and presentations of the various speakers from FoWA London 2007 available for download. Even though I was there I’ve grabbed a bunch of them to listen to and read again as there are some real gems. If only other conference organisers were so generous!

item.title: FoWA Day2, part 2
item.description: Back at base now and didn’t get a chance yesterday to write about some of the other speakers. Overall Day 1 was more impressive than Day 2. The Open Mic slot was poor overall but Phil’s presentation was very entertaining. It was a pity he had so little time as I’m sure a Q&A; afterwards would have been very heated! However we did have another highlight near the end with the guys from MOO.
